custom_nodes.author: sselpah
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-sselpah-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Extension of IPAdapter implementation by cubiq and whoever contributed to that repository

custom_nodes.author: Kishor900
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI WANv2v Video Stitcher
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node pack for WAN v2v long video generation. Provides nodes for chunking, overlap stitching, control group orchestration, debug numbering, and de-overlap merging to create seamless long-form videos.

custom_nodes.author: APZmedia
custom_nodes.title: NormalMapLightEstimator
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for estimating light direction and quality from normal maps using luma masking. The system analyzes surface normals to infer lighting information for downstream tasks like adaptive relighting, directional masking, or stylized effects.

custom_nodes.author: 9nate-drake
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Mask to Center Point Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This pack provides two custom nodes for ComfyUI designed to find the center coordinates of masks and segments. They are useful for workflows where you need to precisely identify the location of objects or regions of interest.

custom_nodes.author: mochidroppot
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ProxyFix
custom_nodes.description: This extension fixes URL encoding issues when ComfyUI is accessed through reverse proxies like 'jupyter-server-proxy'.

custom_nodes.author: guill
custom_nodes.title: Stegaflow
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node pack for embedding workflow data in image pixels using steganography

custom_nodes.author: inoland
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Ino Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Duanyll
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Functional
custom_nodes.description: Easy functional programming and flow control within ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: azazeal04
custom_nodes.title: HybridSamplers for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Custom samplers and schedulers for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: OpenAssetIO
custom_nodes.title: OpenAssetIO
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes adding asset resolution and publishing via OpenAssetIO

custom_nodes.author: jamesk9526
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Nox Prompter
custom_nodes.description: A powerful collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that enhance prompt handling, manipulation, and analysis for better AI image generation results.

custom_nodes.author: jfcantu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI AutoNotes
custom_nodes.description: Automatically display context-aware notes based on workflow state, selected nodes, and node attributes in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: gpdev-Pilcothink
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_pilcothink_VisionSLM
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI nodes to run SLM Vision models (DeepSeek-vl 1.3b chat, Qwen2.5-vl 3b, Gemma-3-4b-it) with optional RAG support.

custom_nodes.author: hanL34
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Power-Artist-Loader
custom_nodes.description: A custom node designed for ComfyUI that can load multiple artist names simultaneously and intelligently combine them into the prompt, with support for independent weight control and real-time preview.

custom_nodes.author: MIUProject
custom_nodes.title: VNCCS - Visual Novel Character Creation Suite
custom_nodes.description: VNCCS is a comprehensive tool for creating character sprites for visual novels.

custom_nodes.author: ttulttul
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Qwen Rectified Flow Tools
custom_nodes.description: This custom node pack for ComfyUI provides a suite of advanced tools for performing 'invert-and-resample' workflows with Rectified Flow models like Qwen-VL. It allows you to take an existing image, convert it to a noisy latent using a guided inversion process, and then use that latent as a starting point to generate creative, high-quality variations.

custom_nodes.author: J-ChenX
custom_nodes.title: NIX ComfyUI Plugin
custom_nodes.description: A collection of plugins for ComfyUI that provides a variety of useful nodes (batch path loading, rotate & crop, mask crop & composition, proportional scaling, slicing, string utilities, arbitrary type switching, image inference, etc.).

custom_nodes.author: gregory-richard
custom_nodes.title: WarpPipe Nodes
custom_nodes.description: WarpPipe - A data bundling and transfer system for ComfyUI workflows

custom_nodes.author: abdullahceylan
custom_nodes.title: AC ComfyUI Queue Manager
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive queue management system for ComfyUI workflows

custom_nodes.author: wzken
custom_nodes.title: Steganos Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI allows you to hide a video file within a PNG image using a file concatenation technique. The resulting image can be viewed as a normal picture, but a standard unzip tool can extract the hidden video from it.

custom_nodes.title: RC Image Compositor
custom_nodes.author: kj863257
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI plugin suite that brings professional Photoshop-style layer effects and advanced compositing capabilities. Features modular architecture, 24 blend modes, and enhanced positioning system.

custom_nodes.author: lrzjason
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-QwenEditUtils
custom_nodes.description: A collection of utility nodes for Qwen-based image editing in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: tritant
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Custom_Switch
custom_nodes.description: It allows you to control complex graphs by unbypass/unmute and bypass/mute entire groups of nodes, just by adding tags in the title of your nodes, no connection required.

custom_nodes.author: Verolelb
custom_nodes.title: Video Compressor (Unified)
custom_nodes.description: Compress video in comfyui.

custom_nodes.author: Verolelb
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Persistent-Queue
custom_nodes.description: CoA simple, friendly way to make your ComfyUI job queue survive restarts and crashes.

custom_nodes.author: rvage
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RvToolsX
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes and utilities for workflow building, type conversions, checkpoint/pipe loaders and file utilities.

custom_nodes.author: GreenLandisaLie
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BooruBrowser
custom_nodes.description: Quickly search and get images from Gelbooru/Danbooru/E621 without leaving ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Art-xmaster
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-AGSoft
custom_nodes.description: NODES: AGSoft Empty Latent, AGSoft ImageRes, AGSoft ImageResMP, AGSoft ImagegPad for Outpainting, AGSoft ImagePad for OutpaintingAdv, AGSoft Image Crop, AGSoft Image Concatenate, AGSoft Image ConcatenateFromBatch, ...

custom_nodes.author: No-22-Github
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RWKV_Studio
custom_nodes.description: A suite of ComfyUI custom nodes based on the RWKV series of models, offering various functions like translation and dialogue.

custom_nodes.author: cyan9977
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_PromptQueue
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node: batch prompt queue from multiline/text file with incremental per-run consumption and {p} templating.

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VoxCPMTTS
custom_nodes.description: A clean, efficient ComfyUI custom node for VoxCPMTTS (Text-to-Speech) functionality. This implementation provides high-quality speech generation and voice cloning capabilities using the VoxCPM model.

custom_nodes.author: BizaNator
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Iterator Extension
custom_nodes.description: A powerful custom node extension for ComfyUI that enables automatic iteration through multiple prompts with corresponding filename generation. Perfect for batch processing different variations like character face angles, poses, or any sequential prompt workflow.

custom_nodes.author: Sampkao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Amage
custom_nodes.description: This repository provides a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI, designed to improve workflow convenience when working with text, image, video, and audio data.

custom_nodes.author: maxmad62
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DiscordWebhookWithInput
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to send an image + a message (e.g. your prompt) to a Discord channel via a webhook.

custom_nodes.author: neverbiasu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ModelScope
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node package for ModelScope API integration, providing seamless access to ModelScope's powerful AI models including Large Language Models (LLM), Vision-Language Models (VLM), and Image Generation capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: aesethtics
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI 3D Model Viewer
custom_nodes.description: A 3D model viewer node for ComfyUI that allows viewing and interacting with 3D models directly in the interface

custom_nodes.author: sumitchatterjee13
custom_nodes.title: vae-decode-hdr
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that preserves High Dynamic Range (HDR) data during VAE decoding, bypassing the default 0-1 range clamping. It also includes a companion 'Linear EXR Export' node for creating professional-grade linear EXR files.

custom_nodes.author: Dalongzhuazi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Gemini-Prompt-Studio
custom_nodes.description: One node generates both T2I & I2V positive/negative conditioning in a single click.

custom_nodes.author: GizmoR13
custom_nodes.title: PG Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Pragmatic utilities for ComfyUI: Lazy Prompt (history + randomizer), Unified Loader (+ mini), Just Save Image (+ passthrough).

custom_nodes.author: ChaosHL
custom_nodes.title: Marvelous-Box-Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: a tool for prompt collect

custom_nodes.author: suhee19
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-orpheus-loader
custom_nodes.description: Custom node for ComfyUI to load the Orpheus TTS base model and prepare it for LoRA injection + speech generation.

custom_nodes.author: Santat2023
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUiRagCustomNodes
custom_nodes.description: This package contains custom nodes for ComfyUI: Image generation using Stable Diffusion and LLM, Uploading and searching images via ChromaDB and MinIO (S3), Integration with CLIP, Ollama, and other tools

custom_nodes.author: fkxianzhou
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Jimeng-API
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for Volcano Ark (Jimeng) API

custom_nodes.author: wallen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-QI-QwenEditSafe
custom_nodes.description: Safe & consistent QwenImage edit encoders and HQ VAE decode for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Vantage with AI
custom_nodes.title: Vantage Long Wan Video
custom_nodes.description: VantageLongWanVideo is a lightweight project management system for ComfyUI, designed for long-running, prompt-driven video generation. It simplifies workflow management by saving prompts to disk, handling continuity across runs, and allowing resuming or regenerating from any point.

custom_nodes.author: ucloud
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUl-UCloud
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to use the UCloud API directly in ComfyUI. UCloud is a high-performance AI computing platform providing powerful image generation models and industry-leading inference speeds. It offers a wide range of AI model options, including popular text-to-image and image editing models, ready to use without local GPU setup.

custom_nodes.author: red-polo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanViTPoseRetargeter
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI port of PoseRetarget, originally implemented in Wan2.2-Animation. Please use it together with WanVideoWrapper.

custom_nodes.author: APZmedia
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Color Profile Reader
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive collection of color manipulation and analysis nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: S4MUEL404
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PromptsO
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive AI API integration and prompt processing toolkit for ComfyUI, providing powerful text and image generation capabilities with advanced prompt manipulation tools.

custom_nodes.author: downlifted
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ComfyGroq
custom_nodes.description: A streamlined ComfyUI custom node package for interacting with GROQ's AI models, including both text and vision capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: sumitchatterjee13
custom_nodes.title: Luminance Stack Processor
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes to process multi exposure images and stack them to produce 32bit exr file with dynamic range data

custom_nodes.author: perckle
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DPIR
custom_nodes.description: A dpir/DRUnet inference node for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: sammykumar
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SwissArmyKnife
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI featuring Gemini AI integration for video and image analysis, with a complete development environment using GPU-accelerated containers.

custom_nodes.author: 3dgopnik
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Arena Suite
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes in a single package: Arena legacy + AutoCache + Updater

custom_nodes.author: 3dgopnik
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI YOLO Mask Process
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for YOLO detection and mask processing

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VoxCPM
custom_nodes.description: VoxCPM TTS. Context-aware, expressive speech generation and true-to-life voice cloning

custom_nodes.author: mcrataobrabo
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-smart-lora-downloader - Automatically Fetch Missing LoRAs
custom_nodes.description: Automatically detect and download missing LoRAs for ComfyUI workflows

custom_nodes.author: ahkimkoo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Audio Segment Plugin
custom_nodes.description: Custom node suite for ComfyUI designed for advanced audio processing

custom_nodes.author: jasonjgardner
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-pixel-art-scalers
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node for scaling pixel art using various algorithms

custom_nodes.author: bmad4ever
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-panels
custom_nodes.description: Comics/Manga like panel layouts.

custom_nodes.author: Noma-Machiko
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ToDevice
custom_nodes.description: A simple collection of device conversion nodes for ComfyUI. These nodes move an image node running on the GPU over to the CPU. They also support moving from CPU to GPU, but in that case, please remove the CPU option from the ComfyUI startup options.

custom_nodes.author: AdamShuo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Switch Any Node
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that provides a dynamic 'Switch' for routing purposes. It allows you to define a list of named labels and select one, outputting the corresponding index and label name. This is useful for controlling the flow of your workflow based on a selection.

custom_nodes.author: Sean-Bradley
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Virtual Webcam
custom_nodes.description: A Virtual Camera Output For ComfyUI. On Windows, it will use the OBS Virtual Camera driver. So make sure you have OBS installed. Then in your other webcam capable applications, such as Google Meet, Teams, Zoom and even OBS itself, you can connect to the OBS Virtual Camera option and see what you are outputting from ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: LukeCoulson1
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI LoRA Combine Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that allows you to combine two LoRAs with adjustable strengths and multiple merging methods.

custom_nodes.author: VraethrDalkr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TripleKSampler
custom_nodes.description: Triple-stage KSampler for Wan2.2 split models with Lightning LoRA

custom_nodes.author: Firetheft
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Pixabay_Gallery
custom_nodes.description: A powerful node for browsing and importing media from Pixabay directly within ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: comrender
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NanoSeed
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for seamless image editing using fal.ai's NanoBanana and Seedream (v4) models. Edit images with AI-powered prompts, supporting multi-image batches, custom resolutions, and easy fal.ai API key integration directly in the node interface.

custom_nodes.author: APZmedia
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI APZmedia PSD Tools
custom_nodes.description: This extension provides PSD layer saving functionalities with mask support for ComfyUI.
